entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21.

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
